title: Man proposes, God disposes
creator_credit: Sophia Selvakumar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When Sophia Selvakumar first came to Australia, she missed her family so terribly she returned to India after 70 days. Eventually, she returned to Australia and set about making this country her new home.
